Interface TempFile

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface TempFile
extends FileUsingComponent

This is an interface to a component that creates a temporary filename

ATTR_CREATE_ON_DEPLOY

static final java.lang.String ATTR_CREATE_ON_DEPLOY
Flag to control whether the file is created at deploy time or system start. Early creation lets us publish our attribute for others, but may mean that not everything is set up. "createOnDeploy"

See Also:
